text: The Australia–Uruguay football rivalry or the Australia–Uruguay soccer rivalry () is an association football rivalry between the Australia men's national soccer team (the Socceroos) and the Uruguay national football team. It dates back to 1974, when Uruguay travelled to Australia for a two-game series before Australia made their FIFA World Cup debut at the 1974 tournament in West Germany. ==Related pages== * Australia–Uruguay relations ==References== Uruguay Category:Football in Uruguay
title: Australia–Uruguay football rivalry
